attributes.action: Bring Back Hempstead car boot in Gloucester
attributes.additional_details: Also this ground was bought on the promise that it replaced the old cattle market , another thing taken from Gloucestershire
attributes.background: The people of Gloucestershire want our car boot back , covid stopped a lot , we just want our lives back to normal , so many people made a living from this site , so many people got together once a week at this car boot , it’s the only day of the week gloucester comes together

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council.
	
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can also petition your local council - you can find out more here: https://www.gloucestershire.gov.uk/council-and-democracy/petitions/epetitions/
